response.overview: Erin is on her way home after a long dayâ€™s work. She follows the elongated shadows of barren trees as she struggles to find her way, battling her own inner voice. Unsure if she is being hunted, her thoughts align with a nearby doe, whose instincts are sparked by carnal awareness.  "There is some hand-drawn animation made with magic markers featured throughout the video. Also, it features movie star, Erin Nixon " - Emilie Crewe
response.title: Appalling Nature
